content.es: Owen y Plock van al supermercado. Es una gran aventura para ellos. Owen quiere aprender español. Plock es su amigo robot.
content.en: Owen and Plock go to the supermarket. It is a big adventure for them. Owen wants to learn Spanish. Plock is his robot friend.

content.es: La lista de compras es un poco larga. Plock dice: "¡Primero, busca tres manzanas rojas!" Owen mira por todas partes.
content.en: The shopping list is a little long. Plock says: "First, look for three red apples!" Owen looks everywhere.

content.es: "¡Ahí están!" dice Owen. "Son grandes y muy rojas. ¡Uno, dos, tres manzanas!" Plock sonríe. "¡Muy bien, Owen!"
content.en: "There they are!" says Owen. "They are big and very red. One, two, three apples!" Plock smiles. "Very good, Owen!"

content.es: Luego, Plock dice: "Ahora, necesitamos cuatro plátanos verdes." Owen busca los plátanos. "¡Aquí están! Son bonitos y verdes."
content.en: Then, Plock says: "Now, we need four green bananas." Owen looks for the bananas. "Here they are! They are pretty and green."

content.es: "¡Fantástico!" dice Plock. "Busca dos cajas de leche azul." Owen camina rápido. "¡Encontré la leche! Es azul y fresca."
content.en: "Fantastic!" says Plock. "Look for two blue milk cartons." Owen walks fast. "I found the milk! It is blue and fresh."

content.es: El último artículo es queso amarillo. Plock pregunta: "¿Dónde está el queso?" Owen sonríe y señala. "¡Mira! Está aquí. Es un queso grande y amarillo."
content.en: The last item is yellow cheese. Plock asks: "Where is the cheese?" Owen smiles and points. "Look! It is here. It is a big, yellow cheese."

content.es: "¡Lo tenemos todo!" dice Owen, muy feliz. Plock dice: "¡Buen trabajo, Owen! ¡Eres un gran buscador y aprendes mucho español!"
content.en: "We have everything!" says Owen, very happy. Plock says: "Good job, Owen! You are a great seeker and you learn a lot of Spanish!"

content.es: Owen y Plock son los mejores amigos. Ellos aprenden, se divierten y siempre tienen nuevas aventuras juntos. ¡Aprender es divertido!
content.en: Owen and Plock are the best friends. They learn, have fun, and always have new adventures together. Learning is fun!

grammar_note: In this story, you can see two key A1 grammar concepts: 1. Adjective Agreement: In Spanish, adjectives (like colors and descriptions) match the noun's gender and number. For example, 'manzanas rojas' (red apples - feminine, plural) and 'plátanos verdes' (green bananas - masculine, plural). 2. The verb 'Ser' (to be): We use 'ser' for permanent characteristics or identity. Examples from the story are 'Plock es su amigo' (Plock is his friend) and 'Son grandes' (They are big).
